text: Hordes of Dragonspear is an adventure for the 2nd edition of the Advanced Dungeons & Dragons fantasy role-playing game, published in 1992. It uses the Battelsystem ruleset for large scale battles. The cover illustration by Doug Chaffee originally appeared in the AD&D; The Player's Handbook (1989). ==Contents== ==Publication history== ==Reception== ==Reviews== *White Wolf #36 ==References== Category:1992 books Category:Forgotten Realms adventures
